titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to expand the use of qualified apprentices by military construction contractors.
Diversity in Apprenticeships Act
Diversity in Apprenticeships Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Diversity in Apprenticeships Act
This bill provides that the Department of Defense must require each offeror for a contract for a military construction project to (1) certify it will establish a goal that not less than 20% of the total workforce for the contract are qualified apprentices, and (2) ensure each contractor and subcontractor that employs four or more workers in a particular classification on the contract must employ one or more qualified apprentices.
